DOC.brief_title: A Study To Investigate The Effects Of End Stage Renal Disease And Hemodialysis On The Pharmacokinetics Of Ropinirole
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : Patients subject 1879 year old . End stage renal patient consistently receive dialysis minimum 3.5 hour , three time per week , hemodialysis blood flow rate > 200mL/min may eligible enter study . Patients must also systolic blood pressure 100190mmHg diastolic blood pressure < 120mmHg . Healthy subject must systolic blood pressure 100150mmHg . Exclusion : Female subject pregnant and/or breastfeeding must participate study .
